mapper.sql: id, doctor_id, dict_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select: select el.id, el.dict_id, sdd.dict_label, sdd.dict_type from expert_label el inner join sys_dict_data sdd on el.dict_id = sdd.id where el.doctor_id = #{doctorId} and el.is_delete = 0 and sdd.status = 0
mapper.insert: insert into expert_label (id, doctor_id, dict_id, create_by, update_by) values (#{label.id}, #{label.doctorId}, #{label.dictId}, #{label.createBy}, #{label.updateBy}) on duplicate key update dict_id = values(dict_id), update_by = values(update_by)
